turns.question: Is temperature still the most recent lab test?
turns.query: select lab.labname from lab where lab.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '027-135082' ) ) order by lab.labresulttime DESC limit 1

turns.question: What was the most recent oral (PO) medication started for patient 002-67875 during this year?

turns.question: Which medication is now the most recent PO start?

turns.question: Has 017-49538 had any sao2 measurements within the normal range during the current ICU stay?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from vitalperiodic where vitalperiodic.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '017-49538' ) and patient.unitdischargetime is null ) and vitalperiodic.sao2 between sao2_lower and sao2_upper and vitalperiodic.sao2 is not null

turns.question: Any new normal sao2 values?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from vitalperiodic where vitalperiodic.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '017-49538' ) and patient.unitdischargetime is null ) and vitalperiodic.sao2 between sao2_lower and sao2_upper and vitalperiodic.sao2 is not null and vitalperiodic.observationtime > '2103-06-15 02:32:00'
